backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister defining DEX, trading pair, price snapshot, arbitrage signal, and decision log types, with APIs to manage DEX configs, record snapshots, run a simple ICPSwap vs KongSwap arbitrage analysis, and log agent decisions.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented product features to frontend files, components, and test requirements, serving as traceability and confidence documentation for delivered functionality.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human-readable index summarizing the purpose of each frontend source file, components, pages, hooks, styles, and configuration used in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables using OKLCH colors, and base styles for consistent application theming.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that sets metadata, page title, and mounts the React application at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application setup configuring TanStack Router routes, wrapping the app with theme and toast providers, and defining all top-level pages.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Root layout component providing the persistent application shell with sidebar navigation, header branding, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AutoRefreshContr: Reusable UI control that manages an auto-refresh toggle with a configurable polling interval and proper interval lifecycle handling.
frontend/src/components/DecisionHistoryT: Table and dialog-based component for displaying backend decision events, including timestamps, results, and detailed reasoning views.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionBlocked: Renders a UI panel explaining that trade execution is not implemented and lists required DEX integration details for ICPSwap, KongSwap, and general execution needs.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Defines the main sidebar navigation with links to core app pages and highlights the active route using TanStack Router state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React Query hook that creates and caches a backend canister actor based on the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, managing login, logout, persisted identity loading, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as DEX configs, trading pairs, agent control, decision history, and price snapshots via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including colors, sidebar styles, and base element styling.
frontend/src/lib/analysis.ts: Provides spread and profitability analysis logic that calculates net profit, assigns a signal level, and returns reasoning based on fees, slippage, and liquidity availability.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Defines validation helpers for canister IDs and trading pair configurations with basic format and value checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AgentPage.tsx: Implements the agent control page, allowing users to start or stop the autonomous agent in dry-run mode and view decision history.
frontend/src/pages/ConfigurationPage.tsx: Implements a configuration UI to add and manage DEX endpoints and their trading pairs, including validation, persistence via backend mutations, and error/success feedback. Supports adding/removing pairs per DEX and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutionPage.tsx: Provides a disabled-by-default execution control page with a mandatory risk acknowledgement checkbox before enabling execution mode. Displays warnings and conditionally shows an execution-blocked panel once acknowledged.
frontend/src/pages/MarketWatchPage.tsx: Renders a market watch dashboard that lists configured DEX trading pairs with placeholder price, reserve, and update data. Includes manual refresh, optional auto-refresh control, and alerts when no pairs are configured.
frontend/src/pages/SelfImprovementPage.t: Static informational page describing planned self-improvement features such as strategy versioning and backtesting. Clearly indicates the module is under development and outlines a future roadmap.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode behavior, content paths, container settings, extended theme values (fonts, colors, radii, shadows), plugins, and custom animations. Establishes the projectâ€™s visual design tokens and utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks the high-level project summary, schema/versioning metadata, and a list of implemented or planned features with requirement IDs and versions. Serves as a structured snapshot of project scope and progress.
